塼字的基本解释

塼
zhuān
古同“砖”。

塼
tuán
古通“抟”，把东西抟弄成球形。

塼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuān］
［《集韻》朱遄切，平僊，章。］
烧制过的土坯。后多作“磚”。
[②]［tuán］
［《集韻》徒官切，平桓，定。］
通“摶1”。
揉捏，堆聚。
[③]［chuán］
［《集韻》淳沿切，平僊，禪。］
陶制的纺锤。

塼字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塼； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页237第08
【集韻】徒官切。同團。【說文】圜也。【周禮】作專。【莊子】作园。【太?】作塼。　又朱遄切，音專。燒墼也。同甎。【古史考】烏曹始作甎。　又淳沿切，音遄。紡塼也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [zhuān]
["Ji Yun" Zhu Dunqie, Pingxian, chapter. ]
Fired adobe. More "bricks" will be used later.
[②]［tuán］
["Jiyun" cut to the official official, Ping Huan, Ding. ]
Linked with "抟1".
Knead and gather.
[③] [chuán]
["Jiyun" Chunyanqie, Pingxian, Zen. ]
Pottery spindle.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Department of Soil Characters] 　 Brick; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 237 08
[Jiyun] Cut the official official. The same group. [Said the text] Won also. 【Zhou Li】for special purpose. [Zhuangzi] As a garden. [Too?] Make bricks.　Zhu Dunqie again, sound special. Burning also. Same as Ling. [Ancient History Research] Wu Cao Shizuo Ling.　Chun cut along again, sound flew. Spinning bricks also.
